svcsubproc.title: Seat Belts- Two Point (Optional)
svcsubproc.para: When the Two Point Seat Belts option is required the seat track option is also required.

step1.para: The seat belt mounting is to the seat frame.

figure.caption: Figure 243. Two Point Seat Belt Seat Frame Mounting (30" Seat Shown)

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. SEAT BELT MOUNTING CLIP, BOLTS AND LOCK NUTS
5. SEAT CUSHION BOTTOM (SHOWN TILTED FOR ACCESS)

step2.para: To remove the lap belt assemblies, disengage the securing clip.
Tilt the seat cushion forward, locate the seat belt mounting bolts and nuts on the seat frame.
Loosen and remove the lock nuts and washers, remove the mounting bolts.
Before re-installing the seat belt assemblies, check the belts for chafing and or wear.

step1.para: The two point seat belt assemblies with handicap application use the seat track assemblies for fastening and securing the seat belts.
Locate the seat belt assembly to be removed, loosen and remove the floor mounted track stud bolt lock nut.
With the lock nut removed, lift the seat belt mounting end from the floor stud.
To remove the floor stud, slide stud forward and lift from track.
